dct_title_s: A Chronological chart of ancient, modern and Biblical history
dct_description_sm: Cover title: Adams' synchronological chart or map of history. Includes illus., port., etc. Dimensions: Color table on sheet ; 70 x 677 cm, folded to 70 x 35 cm.
